alert.note: Alert for Butler; Chase; Harvey; Marion (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 5:10PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Sedgwick, eastern Harvey, northwestern Chase, northwestern Butler and southeastern Marion Counties through 615 PM CDT... At 509 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elbing, or near Whitewater, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newton, Marion, North Newton, Sedgwick, Peabody, Cottonwood Falls, Whitewater, Strong City, Florence, Walton, Elbing, Burns, Lincolnville, Elmdale, Cedar Point, Newton Airport, Wonsevu, Tallgrass Prairie Preserve and Marion Lake. This includes Interstate 135 between Mile Markers 20 and 35. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
